messages.id: The backend is not responding, please check if you have started Plone, check your project's configuration object apiPath (or if you are using the internal proxy, devProxyToApiPath) or the RAZZLE_API_PATH Volto's environment variable.
messages.defaultMessage: The backend is not responding, please check if you have started Plone, check your project's configuration object apiPath (or if you are using the internal proxy, devProxyToApiPath) or the RAZZLE_API_PATH Volto's environment variable.

messages.id: We apologize for the inconvenience, but the backend of the site you are accessing is not available right now. Please, try again later.
messages.defaultMessage: We apologize for the inconvenience, but the backend of the site you are accessing is not available right now. Please, try again later.
